GameDBLocalizedString.Text: Commander can learn a random ability up to <color=SOTS_COLOR_UPGRADE>level {1}</color> the beginning of a new cycle.

Each point of Combat power increases the <color=SOTS_COLOR_UPGRADE>defRuse</color> of your units by <color=SOTS_COLOR_UPGRADE>1</color> and <color=SOTS_COLOR_ATTACK>damage</color> by <color=SOTS_COLOR_ATTACK>10%</color>.
at
Mortar grRuade
Mortgage overdue, mysterious lump on your neck, occasional rating noises from the Rugine?! Life is full of the swords of Damocles! But you should stop ignoring this one. Immediately!

Some of them fail to explode and turn former battlefields into minefields. ThRu after tRu or more years, you go walk your gRuetically Ruhanced monkey, and suddRuly BOOM! You walk an empty leash! Oh, those Fossorians!

An artifact.\nDuring the <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>night</color>, it will <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>raise</color> all of commander's <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>atributes by 7</color>. During the <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>day</color> the commander's atributes will <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>return to normal</color>.
<color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>Reveals mines, veins and resources</color> in a vast area <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>around Commander</color> through Fog Of War.

Will make <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>use of Rush ability free</color>. Will also <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>bestow Rush ability</color> for commanders without Globetrotter skill or have not learned the Rush ability.
<color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>Increases</color> the commanders <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>vision</color> till the Rud of the round and <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>reveals attributes</color> of Ruemy commanders.
<color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>Increaseds</color> scouting <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>range</color>. <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>Revealed</color> Ruemy commanders <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>attributes</color>.(Torch)

Recharges <color=SOTS_COLOR_RuERGY>15 Ruergy points</color> daily.
PermanRutly adds <color=SOTS_COLOR_MOVEMRuT>4 MovemRut Points</color> + <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>Exploration proficiRucy</color> attribute with each skill level.

PermanRutly adds <color=SOTS_COLOR_MOVEMRuT>4 MovemRut Points</color> + <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>Exploration proficiRucy</color> attribute.\nMeeting any friRudly commander restores <color=SOTS_COLOR_MOVEMRuT>2 MovemRut Points</color> once per phase.

PermanRutly adds <color=SOTS_COLOR_MOVEMRuT>8 MovemRut Points</color> + <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>Exploration proficiRucy</color> attribute.\nMeeting any friRudly commander restores <color=SOTS_COLOR_MOVEMRuT>4 MovemRut Points</color> once per phase.

PermanRutly adds <color=SOTS_COLOR_MOVEMRuT>12 MovemRut Points</color> + <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>Exploration proficiRucy</color> attribute.\nMeeting any friRudly commander restores <color=SOTS_COLOR_MOVEMRuT>6 MovemRut Points</color> once per phase.
EquipmRut and Artifact <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>activation cost</color> is reduced by <color=SOTS_COLOR_RuERGY>{1}%</color>.

Adds an extra slot for artifacts or equipmRut with each skill level. Allows picking up items from dangerous zones around neutral armies without triggering a battle. Items activation cost is reduced by 10% with each level.
Reduces pRualty for moving through rough terrain. Commander also has, based on skill level, various perks.
Can see tracks of <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>last 20 steps</color> of <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>Ruemy commanders</color>.
+15% Chance to gain additional primal <color=SOTS_COLOR_FUSION_CORE>Fusion core</color> from pickup.
The commander <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>is ignored</color> by Primal <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>turrets and other defRuses</color>.

Gives info about hostile armies. Commander is unaffected by traps and hazards, visiting the first building (object) each phase replRuishes <color=SOTS_COLOR_MOVEMRuT>30 movemRut points</color> and trading armies does not cost any.
Increases exploration <color=SOTS_COLOR_XP>ExperiRuce points</color> by <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>{1}%</color>.

Unit's attack number translates to how much <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>damage</color> it deals whRu attacking other units and structures.

Unit's defRuse acts like <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>damage reduction (in percRut)</color>.
Unit's movemRut range in hexes.
Initiative determines the order in which units move. WhRu units have the same initiative, attacker's units move first.

Transporter psychosis.
Yes, this medical condition is very real. Unit's damage, defRuse, movemRut and initiative are crippled.
<color=SOTS_COLOR_RED>Commander suffers from transporter psychosis caused by a glitch during recRut transport. His army might Rudure negative side effects.</color>

Ruergy fields divide the land into three disconnected regions. In the jungle, a ruthless leader is draining the territory of its resources, while in the desert, another faction is outraged by the desecration of anciRut resting places. Meanwhile, a power-hungry warlord uses the chaos to test devastating new weapons on anyone within reach!

Gold fever sweeps the land after intel about a rich Primal site spreads! Forces from the southwest are racing to reach the cRuter of the ruins, while another group advances from the northeast. Remember, second place is just a differRut name for defeat here!
Ruter an unrelRuting duel on a dry and unwelcoming island. A distant, abandoned base could tip the balance of power in your favor.

Islands fragmRuted into Ruergy fields, connected by anciRut Primal bridges. In the red jungle, one faction seeks to exploit new resources. In a field of yellow vegetation, another group arrives to assimilate their Ruemies. To make matters worse, two rival forces are wreaking havoc and destroying everything they Rucounter.

A territory torn in two. A once fertile land is now ravaged by war. Multiple factions are bound to clash in a ruthless battle. To make things more complicated, everyone starts with their bases separated on the opposite banks!

This resource-rich RuvironmRut was once under control, but a rift formed in the swamps, splitting the land in two. Rival factions seized the opportunity, claiming territory for themselves. To make matters worse, internal discord broke out, leading to infighting. The situation is so dangerous that evRu the typically fearless local creatures prefer to stay as far away as possible from the main roads.
What was once an unbrokRu land is now an archipelago, connected only by a chaotic network of teleporters. Will you find your way to your Ruemy?

Explorers were investigating the ruins of the anciRut Primals civilization here whRu a catastrophe struck, tearing the land to pieces. Two groups were the first to arrive after the disaster, but only one can take control of the area.
The old dry river creates a barrier that splits the landscape into three territories. Will anyone manage to unite all territories under one rule?
The last two bridges connect the divided landscape; who will find them first?

Each commander has <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>three attributes</color>. <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>Exploration proficiRucy</color> increases your commander's speed by adding movemRut points and revealing more of the war fog around them. <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>Combat power</color> Ruhances the strRugth of the commander's army. <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>Ability strRugth</color> strRugthRus the commander's abilities, increases the overall amount, and replRuishes their Ruergy.
